title: The Scorched Maw
narrative: Heat distorts your vision as you enter the glowing cave.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art, cave entrance, red and orange glow, scorched earth, dark rocks.

title: Magma Stream Crossing
narrative: A river of liquid fire blocks your path.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art, molten lava river, dark basalt banks, orange glow.

title: Obsidian Spire
narrative: A tall black glass rock rises from the magma.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art, sharp obsidian pillar, lava background, high contrast.

title: Sulfur Steam Geyser
narrative: Smelly yellow smoke erupts from the floor.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art, yellow steam clouds, cracked stone floor, pixel smoke.

title: Basalt Column Path
narrative: Hexagonal stones form a natural staircase.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art, basalt pillars, red lighting, volcanic environment.

title: Molten Waterfall
narrative: Lava cascades down a cliff like water.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art, lava fall, liquid fire, dark cave walls, glowing droplets.

title: Glowing Quartz Vein
narrative: Bright crystals illuminate the dark walls.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art, purple crystals, red rock wall, interior cave lighting.

title: The Heat-Dazed Passage
narrative: The air is so hot it feels heavy.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art, hazy cave corridor, heat wave distortion, dark orange tones.

title: Ash-Laden Ground
narrative: A thick layer of grey soot covers everything.

title: Boiling Magma Bubbles
narrative: Large bubbles pop, releasing toxic gas.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art, lava pit with bubbles, orange and yellow circles, dark rock.

title: Firefly Embers
narrative: Tiny sparks dance in the stagnant air.

title: Jagged Stalactites
narrative: Sharp rocks drip with molten stone.

title: Ancient Smelting Site
narrative: An old stone forge left by dwarves.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art, stone anvil, furnace, glowing embers, abandoned cave.

title: The Heart of Magma
narrative: The most intense heat source in the cavern.
imagePrompt: 8-bit pixel art, bright white and yellow center, liquid fire, overwhelming glow.

title: Calcined Skeleton
narrative: Charred remains fused to the wall.

title: Magma-Carved Runes
narrative: Symbols glow with an inner magical fire.

title: Narrow Squeeze
narrative: The walls are hot to the touch.

title: Cavern of Echoes
narrative: The sounds of bubbling lava repeat.

title: Iron-Bound Chest

title: Cool Air Crack
narrative: A tiny breeze suggests an exit nearby.
